## Datasets
```{r, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
# ls lists what objects are in your global environment
ls()
data(farmers_env, package = "geospaar")
ls()
rm(list = ls())
ls()
library(geospaar)
ls()

# Known as a "lazy load"
farmers_env
```
